text: Belén Cuevas López (born 14 August 1967) is a road cyclist from Spain. She represented her nation at the 1992 Summer Olympics in the women's road race. ==References== ==External links== * profile at sports-reference.com Category:Spanish female cyclists Category:Cyclists at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic cyclists of Spain Category:Living people Category:People from Reinosa Category:1967 births
title: Belén Cuevas
